login.userNotExist: User does not exist in the system

hero.description: where passionate chess players and enthusiasts of all levels come together to grow, compete, and develop their strategic thinking. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pro, we offer a welcoming community for everyone!

expertCoaches.title: Expert Coaches
expertCoaches.description: Our coaches are the backbone of Shah2Range. With years of experience in both teaching and competition, they guide every player with care and passion.

visionOfGrowth.title: Vision of Growth
visionOfGrowth.description: We strive to create an inclusive space where chess nurtures intellect, resilience, and lifelong learning for all ages and skill levels.

teamOfSolvers.title: Team of Puzzle Solvers
teamOfSolvers.description: Behind every move is a team of dedicated organizers, arbiters, and volunteers working together to deliver a seamless chess experience.

whoAreWe.question: Who are we?
whoAreWe.answer: "Shatranj Al-Quds" is an educational community-based program aiming to enhance cognitive and life skills for all ages through interactive, certified chess education in Arabic. We operate in schools, centers, and digital platforms.

whoCanJoin.question: Who can join the program?
whoCanJoin.answer: Our programs are open to students from age 3 and above, including beginners, advanced players, professionals, and educators interested in teaching chess.

isCertified.question: Is the program officially certified?
isCertified.answer: Yes. The program is accredited by the Ministry of Education under license no. 18863 and operates under a certified educational framework. We are also partnered with international organizations such as FIDE (World Chess Federation).

courseTypes.question: What types of courses are offered?
courseTypes.answer: We offer beginner and advanced courses, FIDE-certified instructor training, specialized workshops, and interactive digital content.

tournaments.question: Do you organize chess tournaments?
tournaments.answer: Yes. We organize school and local tournaments throughout the year, with motivational prizes and official participation certificates.

howToRegister.question: How can I register for a course or tournament?
howToRegister.answer: You can register via our website through the designated registration form.

onlinePlatform.question: Do you offer an online learning platform?
onlinePlatform.answer: Yes. We provide a digital platform with educational content, practice exercises, and competitions to support skill development.

canPlayOnline.question: Can I play online?
canPlayOnline.answer: Yes. The platform offers safe, supervised training matches against AI or other students.

howToContact.question: How can I contact you?
howToContact.answer: You can reach us via the "Contact Us" page or by email at: Contact@shah2range.com

collaboration.question: Can we invite your team to collaborate with our organization?
collaboration.answer: Absolutely. Educational institutions can submit a request through the website and we'll be in touch to schedule a visit or an introductory meeting.

joinProgram.title: Join a Program
joinProgram.description: Want to join a course, tournament, or school program?
joinProgram.instructions: Fill out our registration form and we'll get back to you soon.

inquiryForm.title: Join Us
inquiryForm.chessKnowledge: How do you rate your chess knowledge?
inquiryForm.successMessage: Your request has been submitted successfully. We'll get back to you soon!
inquiryForm.submitError: Something went wrong while submitting the form.

inSchool.title: In-School Training
inSchool.description: Structured chess programs delivered in schools — following an official curriculum and a clear development plan.

evening.title: Evening Courses
evening.description: Group sessions for students and adults held outside school hours — designed for extra learning and fun.

tournaments.title: Chess Tournaments
tournaments.description: Two competitive series: Jerusalem Open (7 events so far) and Jerusalem School Championships (3 events yearly).

community.title: Community Hub
community.description: A space for casual players and advanced enthusiasts to meet, play, and grow — open to everyone.

hadeel.name: Hadeel A.
hadeel.title: Senior Trainer
hadeel.quote: I've witnessed amazing transformations in our students. Chess is more than a game here – it's a tool for growth.

motaz.name: Motaz M.
motaz.title: Head Coach
motaz.quote: Our training focuses on discipline, focus, and strategic thinking. Proud to be part of this journey.

eman.name: Eman K.
eman.title: Trainer & Mentor
eman.quote: I love guiding kids through their first moves and seeing their confidence grow each week.

jameel.name: Jameel Naser
jameel.title: Youngest Chess Player in Jerusalem
jameel.quote: At just 4 years old, Jameel trains both on-site and online. He can beat you in 4 moves!

hossam.name: Daniel Hossam Bannoura
hossam.title: International Champion (U12)
hossam.quote: Champion of Cyprus U12 – defeating players from 25 countries. A rising star of Jerusalem!

noaman.name: Noaman Sharabati
noaman.title: From Passion to Purpose
noaman.quote: I aimed to make my students love chess — their excitement and progress proved I succeeded.

fideCoaches.title: FIDE Certified Coaches
fideCoaches.description: Learn chess from top-tier coaches officially certified by the International Chess Federation (FIDE). Our instructors combine expertise with a passion for teaching.

visionGrowth.title: Vision of Growth
visionGrowth.description: We strive to be a leading community where chess fuels intellectual development, resilience, and lifelong learning for all ages and skill levels.

beginnerToAdvanced.title: From Beginner to Advanced
beginnerToAdvanced.description: Our structured programs serve players at every stage — from first moves to advanced strategies — with personalized training and competitive growth.
